TitleEnglish: Rascal Does Not Dream of a Dreaming Girl
SummaryEnglish: In Fujisawa, Sakuta Azusagawa is in his second year of high school. Blissful days with his girlfriend and upperclassman, Mai Sakurajima, are interrupted by the appearance of his first crush, Shoko Makinohara.
Aliases: Seishun Buta Yarō wa Yumemiru Shōjo no Yume o Minai
Seishun Buta Yarō wa Yume-Miru Shōjo no Yume wo Minai
Seishun Buta Yarou wa Yumemiru Shoujo no Yume wo Minai
Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai: Movie
